senses.sense_definition: A plant part that has transformed into a leaf-like structure through the process of phyllody.

examples.text: The botanist examined the <w>phyllomorph</w> to understand the genetic mutation affecting the flower.
Instead of a colorful petal, the plant produced a green <w>phyllomorph</w> due to the disease.

senses.sense_definition: A stylized representation of a leaf used in art or decoration.

examples.text: The capital of the column was decorated with an intricate stone <w>phyllomorph</w>.
She admired the delicate <w>phyllomorph</w> painted on the ancient pottery.
